20101225025258.000|20101225025258.000|CC1|      For people with COPD,     
20101225025258.000|20101225025300.000|CC1|  including chronic bronchitis, 
20101225025300.000|20101225025302.000|CC1|       emphysema, or both,      
20101225025302.000|20101225025302.000|CC1|   ADVAIR helps significantly   
20101225025302.000|20101225025305.000|CC1|     improve lung function.     
20101225025305.000|20101225025307.000|CC1| While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101225025307.000|20101225025307.000|CC1|  ADVAIR is different from most 
20101225025307.000|20101225025309.000|CC1|     other COPD medications     
20101225025309.000|20101225025309.000|CC1|       because it contains      
20101225025309.000|20101225025312.000|CC1|    both an anti-inflammatory   
20101225025312.000|20101225025312.000|CC1|        and a long-acting       
20101225025312.000|20101225025314.000|CC1|         bronchodilator,        
20101225025314.000|20101225025314.000|CC1|        working together        
20101225025314.000|20101225025316.000|CC1|   to help you breathe better.  
20101225025316.000|20101225025316.000|CC1|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101225025316.000|20101225025319.000|CC1|  inhalers for sudden symptoms  
20101225025319.000|20101225025319.000|CC1|        and should not be       
20101225025319.000|20101225025321.000|CC1|   used more than twice a day.  
20101225025321.000|20101225025323.000|CC1| People with COPD taking ADVAIR 
20101225025323.000|20101225025323.000|CC1|    may have a higher chance    
20101225025323.000|20101225025325.000|CC1|          of pneumonia.

20101225025325.000|20101225025327.000|CC1|    your risk of osteoporosis
